answers.answer: Dear Friend,Well since you are already diabetic, we can easily name this condition as an early symptom of "Peripheral Neuropathy".Please get your sugars really under control and start up with medicines aimed at improving the nerve regeneration.Vit B12, alpha lopilic acid, etc will be really helpful for you in this condition as they are real good nerve stimulator and aid in regeneration.Beside this, we really can't put much control on the present situation.Yoga can also be lot beneficial to you.Please feel free to discuss, if you got even a slightest doubt.Regards...

question: i am a 40 yr old female with diabetes, i am having shock feelings to my feet ,mostly my left one.   it feels like an electrical cord shocking me in the foot, how can i stop this or at least cope with it
title: shocks to feet, mostly left
